menu.name: Pasta
menu.description: Pasta, a timeless comfort, brings joy with its al dente perfection and diverse sauces.From traditional spaghetti to gourmet creations, its a culinary embrace for every taste.

menuItems.name: spaghetti bolognese
menuItems.Ingredients: With Chianti-braised meat sauce and fresh basil.

menuItems.name: caprese pasta
menuItems.Ingredients: Roma tomatoes, fresh basil, Sicilian extra-virgin olive oil, pine nuts, and fresh mozzarella.

menuItems.name: fettuccine alfredo
menuItems.Ingredients: Freshly prepared fettuccine pasta swirled in homemade cream sauce.

menuItems.name: truffle tortelloni
menuItems.Ingredients: Cheese tortelloni with truffle mushroom sauce, topped with fresh arugula.

menu.name: Pizza
menu.description: Pizza, a culinary classic, enchants palates with its crispy crust and delightful medley of toppings, offering a timeless and universally beloved dining experience.

menuItems.name: paesano
menuItems.Ingredients: Pepperoni, sliced sausage, roasted peppers, red onions, Romano cheese,  olive oil, fresh garlic.

menuItems.name: tuscan vegan
menuItems.Ingredients: No Cheese. Marinara sauce,  mushrooms, black olives, eggplant,peppers,  red onions.

menuItems.name: spicy fennel
menuItems.Ingredients: Roasted red peppers, garlic sauce, carmelized onions, goat cheese, Wisconsin mozzarella.

menuItems.name: shrimp alfredo
menuItems.Ingredients: Pancetta, shrimp, red onions, Alfredo sauce, mozzarella, and fresh arugula.

menuItems.name: italian market
menuItems.Ingredients: Ricotta cheese, pepperoni, red onions, Wisconsin mozzarella, and pizza sauce.

menuItems.name: bufalina pizza
menuItems.Ingredients: Truffle olive oil sauce, Wisconsin mozzarella, fresh arugula, and fresh mozzarella.

menu.name: Dessert
menu.description: Desserts, sweet symphonies on the palate, bring bliss with each decadent bite, transforming any meal into a delightful finale.Here we have different types of desserts.

menuItems.name: italian cannoli
menuItems.Ingredients: An Italian handcrafted pastry shell filled with fresh ricotta cheese and chocolate.

menuItems.name: truffle chocolate
menuItems.Ingredients: Crafted with layers of dark, moist chocolate and a silky truffle chocolate filling.

menuItems.name: carrot cake
menuItems.Ingredients: Studded with raisins, walnuts, and pineapple, finished with a smooth cream cheese icing.

menuItems.name: Tiramisu
menuItems.Ingredients: Homemade with ladyfingers soaked in espresso, layered with fresh mascarpone cheese.

menuItems.name: italian cream cake
menuItems.Ingredients: Sweet cream cake with coconut, pecans, and cream cheese frosting.
